body.name: ARGB PWM Fan Hub, Addressable 5V-3PIN ARGB 12V 4PIN PWM 2-in-1 RGB Case Fan Hub with Controller and SATA Power Input, 9 Fan Port and 9 LED Port, PC Fan hub Support 9 Computer ARGB PWM Fans Splitter
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【ARGB PWM 2 IN 1 Fan Hub】Each port of the ARGB pwm fan hub splitter is PWM function that adjust the fan speed synchronization, easy extend computer case fans to optimize the cooling capacity. Support 5v 3pin ARGB pc fans and ARGB light bars.

【Widely Compatible】The fan hub splitter supports up to 9 fans, including 9 4pin PWM ports and 9 ARGB ports for ARGB fans and ARGB LED strips. The installation is convenient and efficient.4Pin PWM ports supports both 3Pin and 4Pin fans,PWM function depend on fans, so 3pin fan connect the hub don’t have pwm function.

【Magnetic Back Design】This 1 to 9 fan hub is magnetic design, which can be attached to the metal surface of pc case without double-sided tape, very convenient to place on the computer case and put anywhere you want to.

【SATA Power Input】 Fans are input directly from power supply via Sata Power, supporting up to 9 fans, the fan hub prevent stray currents and no voltage loss make sure fan speed smoother and efficient operation.

【Exquisite Size 5.75 inches length】The size of pwm fan hub is 5.75*1.96*0.53 inches, small and exquisite shape makes the internal wiring of your computer case tidy. NOTE: THE CONTROLLER ONLY FOR LIGHT SWITCHING, PLEASE CONNECT 12V 4PIN INTERFACE ON MOTHERBOARD FOR FAN PWM FUNCTION.

The pc fan hub supports up to 9 fans.NOTE: THE CONTROLLER ONLY FOR LIGHTING SWITCHING, PLEASE CONNECT MOTHERBOARD FOR PWM FUNTION.

reviews.reviewText: It's like they just send out retuned products first one was open box missing remote so ordered a replacement and the second one had a remote but it didn't work not willing to give it a 3rd try when there is so many other options available

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Is EXACTLY what I wanted.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This hub/controller is exactly what I needed. After buying RGB fans you will see different types of plugs, this hub uses the fans that have the normal small 3 pin female plug and also a larger wider different 3 pin female plug as a Y type cable from your fan. Make sure they are both connected in order to power the fan and lights simultaneously. If you only connect one side you will get only fan power, if you only connect the other side you will only get light control and fan will stay off. Make sure your fans have both connections on a Y cable coming out of your fan. Not compatible with Corsair fans due to that proprietary connections they use for their own hubs/controller. Cyberpower fans had the connections I needed for this hub. Overall if you have the fans and need a legit and reliable controller/hub and you are sure you have the multiple connectors coming out of your fans, USE THIS.
